text: Hi everyone, just getting going with the UI Extensions -- since we need to spin up a standalone project, is it possible to associate it with an existing public (unpublished) app? I am wrapping up development for Custom Workflow Actions on the public app and want to extend it to also provide UI Extensions

<@U01QVR44MEY> can you send a larger screenshot to show where this card is showing? are you using the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/reference/ui-components/crm-data-components/crm-stage-tracker#crmstagetracker-%7C-ui-components-beta|CrmStageTracker component> in the preview sidebar?
<@U021CFGT73K> yeah it's the CrmStageTracker in a preview card on the deal object, open in the preview panel on the deal listing page
huh i didn't think we enabled our CRM data components in sidebars yet so that might be part of the problem. did you try it and it just worked?
yeah it's being used in a custom react card

got it. since we're not officially supporting CRM data components in the sidebar yet, we won't be able to fix this in Q4. but we do plan to unlock them at some point next year so i can have the team fix it at that point. it's a longer term effort because i need our designer to review every CRM data component and see how it looks in the sidebar (spoiler alert: a lot of them don't look too good) so we need to do that before the team can release CRM data components to sidebar locations. at that point, we'd also let admins create custom cards in sidebars via the UI
